page.title: 06ECOLOGY-BODYNFOEL WOOD
page.content: Bodynfoel wood is the biggest deciduous wood in are domesday survey area.The trees are mainly ash,oak with a few beech dotted around.Deciduous trees are called that because they loose their leaves in the Autumn.Many of the trees have been cut down,but they are going to replant them.There are more animals that live in deciduous woods than coniferous woods Animals like squirrels,rabbits,hare's ect.The birds in deciduous woods are mainly spotted and green wood pecker, willow tit,nuthatch,tree creepers, jays ect.Deciduous woods are becoming rare.That is why deciduous woods are so important.
